hi: ऑstreliyai vayuyana seva kampaniya.n isa nirnaya para vichara kara rahi haim, jisake anusara us vayuyana seva kampaniyom ko isa avashyakata ko purna karane ke lie bahuta adhika karya karane homge, lekina unhomne samketa diya hai ki apani prakriyaom mem parivartana karane ke lie unake pasa koi tatkala yojana nahim hai|
en: Australian carriers are looking at the decision, which requires US carriers to undertake a massive amount of work to meet the requirements, but have indicated they have no immediate plans to change their procedures.

en: The Civil Aviation Safety Authority also said it was looking at the announcement but emphasised that restrictions on the use of electronic devices in critical phases of flight were still in place in Australia.

hi: "vartamana mem casa ke pasa, vimana mem vidyuta upakaranom ke uphayoga ko niyamtrita karane vala koi vishishta viniyamana nahim hai," pradhikarana ne kaha, "yaha mudda viniyamanom ke antargata ata hai, jisake anusara vimana seva samchalana kampaniyom ko sunishchita karana hota hai ki suraksha vyavastha hamesha puri taraha se bani hui hai, tatha yatriyom ko chalaka dala ke sadasyom dvara die jane vale suraksha nirdeshom ka anupalana karana hota hai|"
en: "CASA currently has no specific regulations governing the use of electronic devices in aircraft," it said " The issue is covered by regulations which require aircraft operators to ensure safety is maintained at all times and passengers to comply with the safety instructions given by crew members."

en: "Our current policy is that electronic devices cannot be used during take-off and landing and we have no immediate plans to change that," it said.

hi: faa nirnaya, ameriki elaralainom para lagu hote haim|

en: "Once an airline verifies the tolerance of its fleet, it can allow passengers to use handheld, lightweight electronic devices such as tablets, e-readers, and smartphones-at all altitudes," the FAA said.

en: Typically pawnbrokers in Singapore charge an effective annual percentage rate of 17 per cent, just above the 15.4 per cent offered at United Overseas Bank, a local lender with a branch in the same shopping centre.

en: However, pawnbrokers have the advantage of not requiring credit checks or proof of salary, and can arrange loans faster than banks.

en: Hence millions of people across the region are turning to pawnshops as families feel the squeeze from rising living costs and ballooning household and consumer debt.

en: After five years of robust growth since the global financial crisis, and cheap credit fuelled by loose monetary policy in advanced economies, lower- and middle-income families are turning to pawn shops to make up the difference as their economies slow.

en: In Thailand the largest pawnshop operator, EasyMoney, has seen an up to 20 per cent rise in the number of customers using its outlets in recent months.

en: Such is the growth in the pawn business that ValueMax, operator of the outlet at Bendemeer and of 15 others like it in Singapore, plans to expand not only in neighbouring Malaysia - where it has four shops - but outside Asia too, says Yeah Lee Ching, ValueMax's executive director.

en: To that end, we commissioned the largest and most comprehensive poll of British business leaders asking them for their thoughts on Britain, business and the EU.

en: YouGov polled over 1,000 business leaders, broadly representative of Britain's business sizes, sectors and regions.

hi: isa sarvekshana ke nishkarsha bahuta se logom ke lie ashcharyajanaka ho sakate haim|
en: The conclusions of the poll will come as a surprise to many.

hi: hamane paya ki vyavasayiyom ka eka ba.da hissa aba yuropa se bahara niryata karana chahata hai, tatha una deshom para dhyana kendrita karana chahata hai, jo ki adhunika bana rahe haim va vrriddhi kara rahe haim, jabaki i.yu. sadasya desha gatihina ho rahe haim|
en: We found that the vast majority of businesses are now looking to export outside of Europe, focusing on countries that are modernising and growing while the EU states stagnate.

hi: ve chahate haim ki sarakara china, bharata evam brajila jaise deshom ke satha naye vyaparika sambandhom ko prathamikata de, na ki i.yu. ki rahasyamayi samsthaom ke sudhara ke dirghakalika evam dushkara prakriya mem ulajhi rahe|
en: They want to see the Government prioritise new trading links with the likes of China, India and Brazil, rather than getting bogged down in the long and arduous process of reforming the EU's arcane institutions.

hi: jaba ekadhikara viniyamana se lekara utpada kanuna taka jaise vishishta niti kshetrom ke bare mem unake vichara puche to adhikamsha vyavasaya netrritvakartaom ka manana tha ki ina nirnayaka yogyataom ka niyamtrana vapasa vestamimstara ke pasa ana chahie|
en: When asked their views on specific policy areas - ranging from monopoly regulation to product laws - the majority of business leaders thought that control of these key competences should be returned to Westminster.

hi: ekala bajara ko lekara ama asamtushti bahuta asani se dekhi ja sakati thi, vyavasayiyom ka kahana hai ki braselsa ke viniyamana ki kimata, yuropa ke vyaparika kshetra ka hissa bane hone ke labhom se kahim adhika hai - yaham taka ki vishala vyavasayi jo ki paramparika rupa se yuropiyana kampaniyom ke pakshadhara the, mem se 40 pratishata isa bata para sahamata the|
en: There was general discontent with the Single Market, with businesses saying that the costs of Brussels regulation now outweighed the benefits of being part of Europe's trading area - even 40 per cent of large businesses, traditionally the most pro-European of companies, agreed.

hi: amta mem aura sabase spashta rupa se, vyavasayika netrritvakartaom ke hamare sarvekshana ne paya ki, eka ba.da hissa spashta rupa se chahata hai ki britena, i.yu. ke satha rajaniti ke bajaya vyapara adharita sambandha tatha samdhi parivartana ke marga para age ba.dhe|
en: Finally, and most tellingly of all, our poll of business leaders found a clear majority wanted to see Britain pursue a course of treaty change and a relationship with the EU that is based on trade, not politics.

en: This finding, which was reflected across the sizes and major business groups, shows that business is pushing for a "meaningful change" that brings powers back to the UK.

en: The Treasury have provisionally costed out the CGT measure but are awaiting a final decision from Mr Osborne, who, in the 2012 Budget, introduced a 7% rate of stamp duty for homes costing more than £2m and annual charges for buyers who choose to hold homes in a company rather than as individuals.

hi: kara varsha 2012/13 mem vestaminstara tatha kensimgtana evam chelesa ki nagarom mem avasiya sampattiyom se prapta hone vali staimpa dyuti 708 miliyana paunda rahi, jo ki pahale hi uttari ayaralainda, velsa, skaॉtalainda, tatha naॉrthai ista, naॉrtha vesta evam yaॉrkashayara tatha hambara ke samyukta yoga se adhika hi hai|
en: Already the stamp duty take for residential property in the boroughs of Westminster and Kensington & Chelsea, which stood at £708 million in the 2012/13 tax year, exceeds the combined total for Northern Ireland, Wales, Scotland, the North East, North West and Yorkshire and the Humber put together.

hi: shri kuka ne batayah "uchcha mulya vale gharom ki staimpa dyuti mem vrriddhi tatha esosiyeteda enti-evaॉyadensa vidhana pesha kiye jane ke pashchata, yaha bahasa karana bahuta hi kathina hai ki uchcha mulya vali praॉparti para uchita se kama taiksa hai, jisaka ki purane ho chuke parishada kara pranali ke prabhava se koi sambandha nahim hai|
en: Mr Cook said: "Following increases in stamp duty of high value homes and the introduction of associated anti-avoidance legislation, it is very difficult to argue that high value property is under-taxed irrespective of the effect of the out-dated council tax system."

en: Earlier research had revealed that happy dogs wag their tails more to the right (from the dog's point of view), while nervous dogs have a left-dominated swish.

en: Prof Georgio Vallortigara, a neuroscientist from the University of Trento, said: "It is very well known in humans that the left and right side of the brain are differently involved in stimuli that invokes positive or negative emotions."

en: Pope Francis to name first cardinals in February

hi: kardinalsa, kaitholika charcha mem sarvochcha shreni ke padari hote haim, inaka pada kevala popa se niche hota hai, tatha yahi loga popa ka chayana karate haim, isalie phramsisa apane vyaktiyom ke prathama samuha ki niuyakti karemge, jo amtatah unaka uttaradhikari chunane mem sahayata karemge|
en: Cardinals are the highest-ranking clergy in the Catholic Church below the pope, and they're the ones who elect popes, so Francis will be appointing his first group of men who will ultimately help choose his successor.

hi: abhi vaham kula 201 kardinalsa haim|
en: There are now 201 cardinals.

hi: vaise, 80 varsha ki umra para pahumchane ke pashchata kardinala ko popa ke chunava mem sahabhagita karane ki anumati nahim hoti - yaha 120 "kardinala chunavakarta" ke samuha mem ate haim|
en: However, once a cardinal reaches 80 he is no longer permitted to participate in the election of a pope -- this falls to a group of 120 "cardinal electors."

hi: samachara ki ghoshana karate hue eka vaktavya mem vaitikana ke pravakta phadara phedriko laॉmbardi ne kaha ki nae kardinalsa ko pronnata kie jane ke samaroha se pahale, sabhi maujuda kardinalsa ki baithaka ayojita ki jaegi, jise popa-sabha kahate haim|
en: In a statement announcing the news, Father Federico Lombardi, a Vatican spokesman, said a meeting of all the existing cardinals would be held before the ceremony to elevate the new cardinals, known as a consistory.

hi: lombardi ne kaha, "popa phramsisa ne pharavari ki popa-parishada ayojita karane ke apane nirnaya ko pahale se batane ka nirnaya liya hai, taki duniya ke vibhinna deshom se kardinalsa ki sahabhagita vali anya baithakom ki yojana banana sarala ho jae|"
en: "Pope Francis has decided to communicate his decision to convoke February's consistory in advance in order to facilitate the planning of other meetings involving the participation of cardinals from different parts of the world," Lombardi said.

hi: kaitholika vaॉyaseja ke jaika vailero ne kaha ki pharavari taka kardinala chunavakartaom ki samkhya mem kami ane ki sambhavana thi|
en: Jack Valero of Catholic Voices said that by February, the number of cardinal electors was likely to have dropped.

en: He said usually a pope would name as many cardinals as was needed to raise the number of cardinal electors back to 120 and as many cardinals aged over 80 as he wanted.

hi: vailero ne kaha ki, agale varsha ki popa-sabha mahatvapurna hogi, kyomki isa varsha marcha mem phramsisa ke chune jane ke pashchata yaha pahali popa-sabha hogi|
en: Next year's consistory would be significant because it would be the first since Francis was elected in March this year, Valero said.

hi: vartamana mem yuropa tatha khasa taura para itali ke prati eka prakara ka purvagraha hai|

en: Forty percent of Roman Catholics are in South America, but they have a tiny number of cardinals.

hi: phramsisa dvara kardinalsa parishada - jo duniya bhara se atha kardinalsa ka samuha hota hai, jinaka karya charcha ke sudhara ke tarike talashana hota hai, gathita kie jane ke pashchata chune jane vale ye pahale kardinalsa bhi homge|
en: The cardinals will also be the first to be chosen since Francis formed the Council of Cardinals, a group of eight cardinals from around the world tasked with looking into ways to reform the church.

hi: isake pahale popa sabhi chijom ka nirnaya apane apa lete the|

en: Valero said popes typically elevated bishops from large places to the position of cardinal but that Francis was "full of surprises -- so we don't know who he'll name."

hi: 15 juna ko phuketa pramtiya nyayalaya ne stivi raॉshela baॉmaphorda ko thai pulisa ke upara galata aropa lagane ka doshi paya, usaka aropa tha ki ravivara 10 juna ki subaha eka sthaniya taiksi chalaka ne do anya vyaktiyom ke satha milakara use rokane ka prayasa kiya tha|
en: Stevie Rochelle Bamford was initially found guilty by a Phuket provincial court on June 15 of making false claims after telling Thai police a local taxi driver, with two other men restraining her, carried out the assault in the early hours of Sunday June 10.
